{{Infobox Radio station | name = WBMF | image = <!-- Do NOT place a non-free image here without providing a rationale on the image description page per [[WP:FURG]] --> | city = [[Crete, Illinois]] | area = [[Chicago metropolitan area|South Suburban Chicago]] | branding = ''"SONLIFE Radio Network"'' | slogan = ''"Your Station For The Gospel of Jesus Christ"'' | airdate = | frequency = 88.1 [[Megahertz|MHz]] | format = [[Christian Radio]] | power = 90 [[Watt]]s | erp = | haat = 114 Meters | class = A | callsign_meaning = | former_callsigns = | owner = Family Worship Center Church, Inc. | licensee = | sister_stations =[[WAWF]] | webcast = | website = [http://www.jsm.org/SonlifeNetwork_000.php WBMF Online] | affiliations = SONLIFE Radio Network }} '''WBMF''' is a [[Christian radio]] [[radio station|station]] licensed to [[Crete, Illinois]], broadcasting on 88.1 MHz FM. WBMF is owned and operated by Family Worship Center Church, Inc.
